website_summaries.verdict: Designed specifically for women, the Puma Prowl Alt Mesh was able to please many female purchasers. It received a lot of praise for its comfort, style, breathability, and lightweight construction.
pros: Nearly all reviewers stated that the Puma Prowl Alt Mesh was extremely comfortable
for them, it felt like walking on a cloud
Many users gave high marks to the stylish look of the trainer
Those who used the shoe for the gym and cross-training workouts were happy with its overall performance
The breathable upper was lauded by a handful of wearers
they found it great for the summer season or for the hot environments
Quite a few testers were impressed with the lightweight nature of this shoe
cons: A reviewer wished for more arch support in the midsole

customer_reviews.title: Nice gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 6, these are just a bit snug but I’ve since worn in. They are very cozy and soft in insole, like memory foam. I only wear them to the gym and not for walking or running.
customer_reviews.author: puglover98

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: My wife said she loves them. And I couldn’t have done better if she had picked them out herself. Thanks for providing accurate information. So I can make the right decision
customer_reviews.author: steelworker74

customer_reviews.title: Cute but run small, order a half size up.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are super cute but run small. I ordered my regular size 8 but am returning them and ordering an 8.5. Definitely worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Lora P

customer_reviews.title: Puma shoes that feel like clouds for your feet.
customer_reviews.text: These Puma shoes are true to size and super comfortable. Definitely worth the price and got a fabulous deal on them.
customer_reviews.author: red feather

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. They fit perfectly. Not too tight, and they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Overall good shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cute and fit exactly as expected. The only downside is that there isn't much cushion in the bottom (I've had other Pumas that had LOTS of cushion) so not great to wear to work all day or anything like that. Perfect for a quick run or workout though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them Now!!!
customer_reviews.text: True to size, very comfy & worth the buy. They look way better in person too!
customer_reviews.author: KeKe23

customer_reviews.title: Puma
customer_reviews.text: Price was great in the store was 65 compare with Amazon 40 !!! compare with some store !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes I own! I had to buy them in another color I loved them so much. They do run a little small so I ordered a half size up on my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: great style and fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of these shoes and they really look good on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: They look just like the picture and are incredibly comfy! Probably the lightest shoes I’ve ever owned and super comfy for working out. I’m buying another pair! I even got them a couple days before the delivery date BONUS
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for walking, about 3 miles each day. They are comfortable and give good inner arch support preventing pronation and knee strain.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Spiller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to put on, Lots of support, & comfortable
customer_reviews.author: lopCrew

customer_reviews.title: Heart the Neon
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, plus it matches a Puma top I have.
customer_reviews.author: nthewoods

customer_reviews.title: run small but is great anyways
customer_reviews.text: i love it..... the only thing is that if your size is 7 you should get 7 and half... cause run just a lil small.... but since that... is a beautiful shoes... i’ll recomend it
customer_reviews.author: zeni

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are as described and true to picture. They were meant to be work shoes but have become my go-to everyday shoe. Thinking about buying every color.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly of Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered early which I love! They look amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, memory foam sole and interior. Fits true to size. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love shoes wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Live the shoes. Soft and comfortable. One problem got sent the wrong size
customer_reviews.author: Timbi

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the way they fit they are so comfortable on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

product_meta.title: PUMA Womens Prowl Alt Prem Mesh Casual Sneakers,
product_meta.description: Lock down your performance with the PUMA® Prowl Alt Perm Mesh sneaker. Lightweight textile upper in a low-top silhouette. Lace-up closure for a custom fit. Pull tab at tongue. Textile lining for added airflow. Padded footbed. EVA foam midsole. Rubber outsole for added durability and traction. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 6.9 oz Product measurements were taken using size 7.5, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
